name: INTERNATIONAL CHRISTIAN CHAMBER OF COMMERCE
description: Encourage Christians to experience faith in their business and working lives
sampleDescriptions: Raising awareness of the group's work in fostering commercial ties between Christian businesses and the state of Israel.
